last_episode_to_air.name: Fight, Flight or Flee
last_episode_to_air.overview: In Ohio, cops face a hostage situation with a dangerous fugitive willing to go to extremes. In Maryland, armed robbers are caught in the act and run from the law. In Indiana, police risk it all to save circus animals inside a burning truck.

name: Body Cam
overview: Body cameras capture the life-or-death decisions made by police officers, from domestic disputes to traffic stops gone dangerously awry.

episodes.name: Officer Down
episodes.overview: In Ohio. Officers find themselves pitted against a lone gunman holed up in a suburban home; the nerve of a rookie cop is tested when a routine stop on the highway goes horribly wrong.

episodes.name: Shots Fired
episodes.overview: In Florida, a domestic dispute turns into a hostage situation with children's lives at stake; in Virginia, a vehicular accident turns into a multiple murder with armed killers on the run; in South Carolina, a disturbance at a liquor store leaves an officer fighting for his life.

episodes.name: Cover me
episodes.overview: In Georgia, two police officers respond to a domestic disturbance that ends in tragedy; in New York, a house fire turns into a murder investigation; in Oklahoma, the search for a known sex offender builds to a shocking conclusion.

episodes.name: Disorderly Conduct
episodes.overview: In Ohio, a police officer tracks down an armed carjacker and comes under heavy fire; in Washington, a stabbing in broad daylight forces the police to take decisive action; in Georgia, a routine traffic stop results in an officer being shot and fighting for his life.

episodes.name: Worst Case Scenario
episodes.overview: In Ohio, a breakup turns deadly; in Texas, a traffic stop puts a child's life at risk; in Oregon, a killer on the run leaves a state trooper fighting for his life.

episodes.name: Standoff
episodes.overview: In Albuquerque NM, a man with an AK-47 steals a police car and fires at police during a 16-mile citywide chase; in Iowa, a home invasion call escalates into something far more terrifying.

episodes.name: The Chase
episodes.overview: In Iowa, a dangerous felon steals a truck and rams everything in his path; in Iowa, on a freezing winter night, a lone officer is attacked by a crazed half naked man; in California, at a county jail, a gunman fires at unarmed officers, leaving one fighting for his life.

episodes.name: High Stakes
episodes.overview: In Arizona, a detective leads his heavily armed team on a search warrant but ends up in the firing line himself; in Kentucky, a routine traffic stop turns violent as the suspect makes a risky getaway; in New York, a knife-wielding man draws police into a dangerous foot chase.

episodes.name: Up Against the Clock
episodes.overview: In Georgia, police hunt for two suspects who are responsible for a string of armed robberies; in Texas, an undercover cop foils a murder-for-hire plot; in Oklahoma, a known felon tries to force an officer off the road, stopping at nothing to escape arrest.

episodes.name: Under Siege
episodes.overview: In Colorado, on New Year's Eve, a domestic dispute ends in tragedy when two deputies are trapped with a gun-wielding suspect; in Iowa, a high-speed pursuit escalates to a gruesome conclusion.

episodes.name: My Name Is Death
episodes.overview: Officers confront a knife-wielding suspect. In Florida, a man who flees into the woods is outsmarted by a K9 Officer. In Indiana, a gunman wages war on police, caught on surveillance cameras, until SWAT closes in.

episodes.name: 90 Minutes
episodes.overview: Police pursue a father & son. An officer joins the chase and his life changes when he comes face to face with the armed suspects. In Ohio, a man threatens himself and his family. An officer negotiates over a video call, leading to a stand-off.

episodes.name: Knife's Edge
episodes.overview: In Ohio a man shoots his ex. She flees and violence erupts when an officer finds him. In Utah police are called to a house where a mother and children have escaped a suspect armed with a machete. In California a therapist is attacked by a former patient.

episodes.name: Code 30
episodes.overview: In New York, a domestic disturbance takes a violent turn which changes a police chief's life; in Florida, an officer is separated from his K-9 while chasing two suspects; in Indiana, an officer stares down the barrel of a suspect's gun.

episodes.name: Hunted
episodes.overview: In Texas, police set a trap for a would-be killer; a high-speed chase leads police into a Florida swamp, where a police dog locates the suspect who now needs to be rescued.

episodes.name: On the Edge
episodes.overview: Arkansas police stop a knifeman enraged over a midnight pot roast; in Delray Beach, Fla., officers must rescue two children teetering on a ledge with their mother who is high on drugs; in Utah, a trespasser attacks an officer with his own baton.

episodes.name: In the Crosshairs
episodes.overview: Arkansas officers are pinned down by a deadly gunman for four hours; after a high-speed chase of a stolen pick-up, Oklahoma City officers fear an ambush when a suspect bails; a naked driver waving a gun leads Wisconsin police to a dangerous standoff.

episodes.name: Long Shot
episodes.overview: An Arizona mother triggers a desperate search for her son, who is armed and suicidal; an Ohio officer fights for his life when a suspect overpowers him; a Wisconsin man shoots his co-workers and police must find him to stop the threat.

episodes.name: Armed & Dangerous
episodes.overview: In California police face off against a knife-wielding bodybuilder; a wanted criminal draws an officer into a brawl in a sex shop, and a fleeing suspect drives a car directly at officers to escape.

episodes.name: Flight Risk
episodes.overview: A suspected drug dealer in Georgia won't go down without a fight; police in Ohio fear for their lives when faced with an ambush from a hidden gunman; after a high-speed chase, a fleeing driver has one more surprise for Macomb County Deputies.

episodes.name: Taken By Surprise
episodes.overview: Police are ambushed as they try to rescue a gravely injured pregnant woman.

episodes.name: Kidnapped
episodes.overview: All police units desperately try and catch the suspects who snatched a baby from the hands of its mother and return the child; officer makes a routine traffic stop and ends up fighting for his life when he suffers a severe reaction.

episodes.name: Run for Cover
episodes.overview: A deputy races to a house fire intent on saving the woman trapped inside.

episodes.name: Deception
episodes.overview: In Florida, after a high-speed chase, a sheriff's K9 is let loose on its first pursuit; deputies in an Arkansas jail face a battle when inmates turn violent; in Georgia, officers head into the woods to hunt down a violent felon.

episodes.name: In Harm's Way
episodes.overview: A tense scene unfolds as a terrified woman barricades her family at home.

episodes.name: Blink of An Eye
episodes.overview: A new cop's career may be over before it begins when a stop turns deadly.

episodes.name: Moments From Death
episodes.overview: SWAT is on the scene to temper a life-threatening domestic stand-off.

episodes.name: Lie In Wait
episodes.overview: An SUV careens into a house, causing an earthshattering explosion.

episodes.name: Fight Or Flight
episodes.overview: Armed bank robbers are brazenly determined to avoid prison at any cost.

episodes.name: Race Against Time
episodes.overview: A machete-wielding madman leads police on a wild car chase through town.

episodes.name: Life in Ruins
episodes.overview: In Ohio, SWAT tears down a house to arrest two brothers wanted for murder. In Washington, a high-speed pursuit ends when a crash entangles an officer's car in live electrical cables. In Texas, a DWI driver hits a goods train carrying explosive chemicals.

episodes.name: Taken
episodes.overview: In Colorado, an unpredictable armed ex-convict takes his family hostage and threatens to kill them and himself. In Florida, a gas station robbery leads to a life-threatening attack on a police officer and a night-time manhunt in the woods.

episodes.name: Seconds from Death
episodes.overview: An armed robber starts a deadly shootout on a city bus in Maryland. A California police officer races to drag a man from a wheelchair stuck on a train level crossing. In Ohio, police officers attempt to rescue a woman trapped inside a raging house fire.

episodes.name: No Surrender
episodes.overview: A car crash ignites a fireball that threatens a Maryland officer making a traffic stop. In Ohio, an armed burglar hides in a closet, and officers must smoke him out. In Texas, an officer confronts a wanted felon who suddenly pulls a gun on him.

episodes.name: Smoking Gun
episodes.overview: In Florida, a man is shot dead with a single bullet to the chest. It looks like a murder, but the inquiry takes a surprising turn. In Oklahoma, a high-speed pursuit turns rescue mission as the chase ends in a fiery crash.

episodes.name: Flash Point
episodes.overview: An undercover agent buying drugs and guns from Florida gangs finds himself at the wrong end of the barrel. A young mom and her kids are about to be swept away by a sudden torrent, and a truck plows recklessly through rural Ohio.

episodes.name: Near Miss
episodes.overview: A Washington State car chase ends with a shootout and a K9 fighting for its life. Pensacola police officers attempt CPR on a drowned 3-year-old girl, and a convoy of Ohio police cruisers scream through downtown Columbus in pursuit of their own car.

episodes.name: Man Down
episodes.overview: Hundreds run in terror as a gunman opens fire in an Indiana bingo hall.

episodes.name: Manhunt
episodes.overview: A home invasion ends in a shootout, and a robbery escalates into a manhunt.

episodes.name: Crisis
episodes.overview: A routine traffic stop turns violent, and police conduct a frantic search

episodes.name: Firing Line
episodes.overview: In Florida, a suspect's car going 45 miles per hour, drags a Pembroke Pines PD officer behind it. In Georgia, a domestic dispute turns into a shootout, leaving one officer fighting for his life. In Michigan, a routine traffic stop turns into a car chase.

episodes.name: The End Of The Road
episodes.overview: In Wisconsin, Rhinelander PD attempts to foil a murder for hire by going undecover and meeting the suspect as a hitman. In Colorado, law enforcement from two counties tries to stop a runaway semi-truck before it devastates the little town of Brush.

episodes.name: Wrong Turn
episodes.overview: In Ohio, police try to rescue a woman trapped in a sinking car which puts an officer's life in danger. In Florida, a high-speed pursuit ends in a swamp, where the suspect shoots at police and escapes. Specialist units set out to locate the criminal.

episodes.name: On the Brink
episodes.overview: In Ohio, officers respond when a man brandishes a knife in a store; in Georgia, police launch a manhunt after a suspect escapes in his truck, leaving an officer down.

episodes.name: Fired Up
episodes.overview: Police race to an armed robbery and face a hail of shotgun pellets; a gas explosion lifts the roof off an apartment building, engulfing officers in a fireball; in Georgia, a man fights for his life in a wrecked SUV.

episodes.name: Red Alert
episodes.overview: Police hunt a murder suspect. Officers try to save a couple in an icy lake.

episodes.name: The Sting
episodes.overview: Information leads undercover FBI officers to a plot to murder lawmakers. A Florida man throws himself into alligator-infested waters to evade arrest, and in Phoenix, fire threatens to consume a driver trapped in a wrecked car.

episodes.name: Get Out
episodes.overview: Officers catch burglars in the act, and a house fire traps a woman inside.

episodes.name: In the Shadows
episodes.overview: Police chase a known criminal through the dangerous Ocala National Forest; in Michigan, a spree of home invasions escalates into a three-day manhunt.

episodes.name: The Fugitive
episodes.overview: A suspect swims for freedom, leading cops on a hunt through the mangroves.

episodes.name: In the Line of Fire
episodes.overview: A burglar hides behind a pregnant woman, and a car chase triggers gunfire.

episodes.name: Reckless
episodes.overview: Store robbers take a hostage, and a drunk driver hits a mom and her baby.

episodes.name: Talk to me
episodes.overview: A body displays a grisly surprise, and cops stand off with an armed abuser.

episodes.name: High Impact
episodes.overview: A man holds a driver at gunpoint, and a plane crashes onto train tracks.

episodes.name: Feeling Lucky?
episodes.overview: A handcuffed man flees in a squad car, and a gas station shoot-out erupts.

episodes.name: Catch Me!
episodes.overview: A body leads to a high-speed chase and a felon steals a squad car and guns.

episodes.name: Family Ties
episodes.overview: A man shoots his baby's mom, and a marijuana heist sparks a chaotic chase.

episodes.name: 7 Seconds
episodes.overview: A routine traffic stop in Georgia turns into a high-speed chase; a hostage situation in Ohio turns into a deadly firefight; a fleeing suspect crashes into a truck in Texas; and police are forced to battle the ensuing fire to save an innocent victim.

episodes.name: Breathe
episodes.overview: A suspect shoots two officers, and a dad threatens to blow up a community.

episodes.name: Split Second
episodes.overview: A house burglary in Michigan turns fatal as the suspect holds the homeowners and their child hostage and opens fire on police; police following carjackers in Florida find themselves chasing two different suspects.

episodes.name: One Shot
episodes.overview: A baby's life hangs in the balance when an ex-con takes him hostage.

episodes.name: Into the Darkness
episodes.overview: In Washington State, an off-duty officer spots a wanted criminal in an elementary school; officers in Georgia chase a woman on a violent rampage in her car; in Florida, a stolen car crashes, and the suspect flees into an alligator-infested marsh.

episodes.name: Baby Driver
episodes.overview: Police race through the night, pursuing an armed car thief; when an officer comes to the aid of a suspect's dogs, his act of kindness gets shot down in a hail of bullets; a couple's beef turns an officer's day on its head.

episodes.name: Don't Let Me Die
episodes.overview: In Wisconsin, officers cautiously approach a dangerous driver's wrecked car. Refusing to exit the vehicle, the driver suddenly opens fire on them. In Washington State, a community rallies to protect two officers shot in the line of duty.

episodes.name: Failure to Comply
episodes.overview: In Florida, a father kidnaps his own child. A wanted fugitive in Georgia fires six shots at a police officer, igniting panic in the neighbourhood. And in Ohio, a suspect attempts to evade police by escaping into a kids' daycare centre.

episodes.name: Deadly Intent
episodes.overview: A shooter with an AR-15 opens fire on 300 clubbers in Orlando, Fla.; hiding in the bathroom, he takes multiple hostages; it's a race against time to save their lives; in Washington, a thief steals a shotgun from a Walmart, and K9 officers track him.

episodes.name: Unforeseen
episodes.overview: In Florida, a felon breaks into an elementary school, causing a code red alert; a traffic stop in Arizona escalates when the suspects steal an ambulance; officers in Utah respond to reports of a man threatening staff with a gun at a drive-thru.

episodes.name: The Unexpected
episodes.overview: In Wisconsin, a suspected hit-and-run takes a dangerous turn when a witness opens fire leaving two officers down. In Georgia, a mother and her children hide in a closet after a gang leader barricades himself in their apartment.

episodes.name: Armed Response
episodes.overview: In Tennessee, officers arrive at an office where two women and a child are held hostage by a gunman; for 14 hours, officers attempt to secure their release; in Illinois, officers join a multi-state search for an armed bank robber.

episodes.name: No Hiding Place
episodes.overview: In Utah, a wanted felon, who has threatened his family's life, is on the run. As officers close in on him, he makes a desperate move, breaking into a family's home and taking them hostage. Officers work through the night to secure their release.

episodes.name: Race Against Time
episodes.overview: In Wisconsin, a terrified woman wakes up in her car and finds it's been stolen by a thief, sparking a high-speed police pursuit; a home invasion in Utah turns into a fire rescue, when a man sets the house alight with the residents still inside.

episodes.name: Nowhere to Hide
episodes.overview: In California, an argument in a bar leads to a deadly hostage situation. In New Mexico, a shoplifter unexpectedly fires upon an officer before going on the run. In Wisconsin, a suspect disappears into the frozen wilderness after flipping his car.

episodes.name: Line of Duty
episodes.overview: In Florida, when a thief goes on the run, he draws officers and their K-9 into a deadly ambush. In Wisconsin, a traffic stop becomes a manhunt. An officer must ram a suspect head-on to get him off the road, putting her own life on the line.

episodes.name: Digging for Trouble
episodes.overview: In Vermont, a dad wielding an excavator attacks officers to stop them from arresting his son. In Wisconsin, a police pastor on a ride-along gets caught up in a high-speed chase. In an Indiana motel, a wanted man opens fire on police.

episodes.name: Hunter and the Hunted
episodes.overview: In New Mexico, a desperate mother clings to her car when a carjacker steals it with her babies inside; just before dawn in Arizona, a SWAT team must locate an individual spotted inside a pawn shop packed with guns.

episodes.name: Desperate Measures
episodes.overview: In Oklahoma, officers negotiate with a delusional father who's armed and dangerous. In Florida, officers chase a joyrider determined to evade capture. In Arizona, State Troopers are called out to rescue a driver trapped in torrential waters.

episodes.name: Psycho 1
episodes.overview: In New Mexico, a carjacker shoots an officer before going on the run, leading officers into a deadly confrontation. In Oklahoma, police respond to a domestic violence call to find a mysteriously empty house. Can they hunt down this dangerous suspect?

episodes.name: He Shot Me!
episodes.overview: A man shoots a cop at a traffic stop, and police hunt armed suspects.

episodes.name: A Hail of Bullets
episodes.overview: Shots fire in a retirement town, a felon flees, and a man takes hostages.

episodes.name: Crying Wolf
episodes.overview: Officers face a prison van hijack and strangers brutally attack a family.

episodes.name: K-9 Down
episodes.overview: n Wisconsin, a K-9 saves officers' lives by taking down an armed fugitive but gets shot in the head. In Connecticut, a patrolman comes under fire during a store robbery. In Oklahoma, a head-on collision with a deputy leads to a full-scale manhunt.

episodes.name: Condition Critical
episodes.overview: In Texas, an officer is shot multiple times during a foot chase. The race is on as backup tries to locate the injured officer and track down the assailant. In Washington State, a fugitive carjacks several vehicles, causing destruction on the roads.

episodes.name: Fire and Fury
episodes.overview: In California, a man holds his child hostage. While officers negotiate with him, he sets the house on fire. And in Florida, criminals break into a jewelry store. The race is on to catch them before they escape with over $70,000 worth of jewelry.

episodes.name: Fight, Flight or Flee
episodes.overview: In Ohio, cops face a hostage situation with a dangerous fugitive willing to go to extremes. In Maryland, armed robbers are caught in the act and run from the law. In Indiana, police risk it all to save circus animals inside a burning truck.
